translations: 击退，驱逐；使厌恶，使反感；抵制，不愿接受（repel 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I was repelled by the smell.
I was repelled by the smell of drink on his breath.
sentences.translation: 他呼吸中的酒精气味让我恶心。

sentences.sentence: She was very striking but in some way I felt repelled.
sentences.translation: 她非常吸引人，但是我觉得有些反感。
